dataset.select: SELECT start_time AS start_time_raw, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f',start_time) AS start_time, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f',start_time + duration_ms * (1.0 / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24))) AS end_time, (CASE WHEN duration_ms < 1000 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) as instant, app_name, username, dataset, '' AS error FROM request WHERE ({$sid} IS NULL OR sid = {$sid}) AND ({$user} IS NULL OR username = {$user}) AND ({$app_name} IS NULL OR app_name = {$app_name}) UNION SELECT start_time AS start_time_raw, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f',start_time) AS start_time, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f',start_time) AS end_time, '1' as instant, app_name, username, dataset, message AS error FROM error WHERE ({$sid} IS NULL OR sid = {$sid}) AND ({$user} IS NULL OR username = {$user}) AND ({$app_name} IS NULL OR app_name = {$app_name}) ORDER BY start_time_raw
